greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of compositions of n such that the maximal distance between two identical parts equals one.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..900 (terms 0..650 from Alois P. Heinz)
maple: g:= proc(n, k) option remember; `if`(k<0 or n<0, 0,
b:= proc(n, i) option remember; expand(`if`(i*(i+1)<n, 0,
a:= n-> (p-> add(coeff(p, x, i)*i!, i=0..degree(p)))(b(n$2))
mathematica: a[n_] := With[{p = b[n, n]}, Sum[Coefficient[p, x, i]*i!, {i, 0, Exponent[p, x]}]] - Sum[g[n, k], {k, 0, Floor[(Sqrt[8n + 1] - 1)/2]}];
a /@ Range[0, 50] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Dec 29 2020, after _Alois P. Heinz_ *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 14 2015
